channel.title: Extra Stealth Suit for trade
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Extra Stealth Suit for trade"

item.title: Re: Extra Stealth Suit for trade
Re: Extra Stealth Suit for trade
item.content:encoded: That works for me. thanks Lear. I'll go and put the suit in the storehouse now.

item.title: Re: Extra Stealth Suit for trade
item.content:encoded:
I won a second K-dog's Headband from the party wheel…. uh…. yesterday I think. Either that or the day before.

Anyway, I don't really need a Stealth Suit (already have one), but if a trade would suit you, I'd be willing to make one.

Edit: I'm just going to drop the K-dog's headband in the storehouse now, and (assuming you still want to trade) you can just get it whenever you're on and have been given permission. You can do the same with the Stealth Suit if you wish.

If you don't want to trade for whatever reason, just let me know, and I'll ask Uzuki/naito for permission to take my Headband back.

item.title: Re: Extra Stealth Suit for trade
item.content:encoded: Actually, I wouldn't say no to trading it for a Codec, either.

item.title: Extra Stealth Suit for trade
item.content:encoded: basically, i just won a second Stealth Suit from the prize wheel and I was wondering if anyone would be willing to trade a K-Dog's Headband for it. btw, my character's name is Stone245. just figured i'd mention that since my name on here is different.
